abstractContent.text: Subjectivity and sentiment analysis focuses on the automatic identification of private states, such as opinions, emotions, sentiments, evaluations , beliefs, and speculations in natural language.

entities.text: identification of private states, such as opinions, emotions, sentiments, evaluations , beliefs, and speculations in natural language

abstractContent.text: While subjectivity classification labels text as either subjective or objective, sentiment classification adds an additional level of gran-ularity, by further classifying subjective text as either positive, negative or neutral.
